item.title: Just need some help (some scripts for scarpscape :P)
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

your welcome…and if you are able to do -fedexer-'s global object TuT, you can basically add anything you want…portals, tables, trees, etc…but its a hard TuT to understand[br][size=1]Posted on: May 24, 2007, 11:37:41 PM[/size][hr]sorry about the double post again…but if you can’t find

for(int i = 0; i < 25; i++) setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]);

try searching for

setSideBarInterface(7, 1);

ooh…and i would Leave OUT the //blank and stuff…it messes up your tabs big time

item.title: Just need some help (some scripts for scarpscape :P)
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


That is Heet48’s TuT on how to make npcs drop bones.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


There is Java’s TuT on how to make doors open and close[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 11:58:14 PM[/size][hr]Sorry about the double post…but…here is how to make that blank tab become ancients.
1.Look for for(int i = 0; i < 25; i++) setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]);
2.A little bit below you should see (might be a little different)

setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); //Attack setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); //Skills setSidebarInterface(2, 638); //quests setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); //backpack setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); //equipment setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); //prayer setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic setSideBarInterface(7, 1); //Blank setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); //friends setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); //ignore list setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); //logout setSidebarInterface(11, 904); //game options setSidebarInterface(12, 147); //player controls setSidebarInterface(13, 12855); //music
3. replace

setSidebarInterface(7, 1); //Blank might not say //blank
with

setSidebarInterface(7, 12855); //Ancients Tab leave out the “//ancients tab” if rest of the “setSiderbarInterface” isnt labeled
4. Save, Compile, Run
*has not been tested yet so not entirely sure if it will work
Credits:2% Me, 49% billygotshot (Got Part of Tut From), 49% Zandia (Got Part of TuT From)

Just Tested…Works 100% Tested on 5-24-07 at 4:15 pm PST

Read full topic

item.title: Just need some help (some scripts for scarpscape :P)
item.dc:creator: @snapel snapel
item.description:
@snapel wrote:

Ok im new at Java, i recognized that it isint very dificult, but im still learning, so can some1 post some scripts for scrapscape. This what do i need:

Mage;
Shops at NPC’s;
Doors;
Prayer;
Prayer altars;
Certain enemy drops (like bones, or some gold);
Changing the starting island (and going right there when you die) , and for first login char set up;
Some other NPC’s, that says text which i want;
Making other NPC’s (penguin, yeti etc.);
Changing wild, not wild zones;
In empty menu putting in Acient spells;

And one more thing:

When i write ::emote [number], then you get adittional emotes, like “matrix” from agility, flying and others.

Please i rlly need help, credits will be given! If needed Admin status.

Read full topic
item.source: Just need some help (some scripts for scarpscape :P)
